key.description: The value of the keys or keys pressed by the user.

events.name: onKey
events.description: Fired when the user presses a key, and the WebExtension is allowed to handle that key press.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The event object for the key that was pressed.

events.name: onKeyPreventable
events.description: Fired when the user presses a key, and the WebExtension is allowed to handle that key press, and not if the web page has called `event.preventDefault()`.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The event object for the key that was pressed.
